title: "Machine learning classifies predictive kinematic features in a mouse model of neurodegeneration"
excerpt: "Feature ranking algorithms identified kinematic features that when considered simultaneously, achieved high genotype classification accuracy. The identified features demonstrated an age-specific kinematic profile of the impact of APP-overexpression."
